item.description:
Let's welcome spring with a Pug Meetup on Sunday, April 14th from 11am-1pm.Â  I am in desperate need of a pack of pugs fix!!

Anyone who is attending the meetup for the first time, please be sure to bring in proof of vaccinations for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for their pug after the meetup, please let me know ahead of time so that I have a groomer staffed.

Any questions, please don't hesitate to call me (781.245.1237).

Looking forward to seeing you all again!

Agni & Velvet
item.name: April Pug Meet Up
